Class DriveFSM

java.lang.Object
MRILib.statemachine.DriveFSM
public class DriveFSM extends Object
Controls robot motion during autonomous using a finite state machine.

Manages a sequence of autonomous steps (BotState), executing them sequentially. Supports moving to specific coordinates (moveTo(double, double, double, java.lang.Runnable)) and waiting (waitForSeconds(double)), optionally running parallel commands (Runnable) during steps. Uses a PIDController for motion control based on Bot odometry.

Coordinates are in inches based on the FTC field standard.

    • moveTo

      public void moveTo(double x, double y, double theta, Runnable command)
      Adds a moveTo step with a parallel command and default timeout.
      Parameters:
      x - Target X coordinate (inches).
      y - Target Y coordinate (inches).
      theta - Target heading (degrees).
      command - Runnable command to execute in parallel.

    • moveTo

      public void moveTo(double x, double y, double theta, double timeout)
      Adds a moveTo step with a specific timeout and no parallel command.
      Parameters:
      x - Target X coordinate (inches).
      y - Target Y coordinate (inches).
      theta - Target heading (degrees).
      timeout - Maximum time for this step (seconds).

    • moveTo

      public void moveTo(double x, double y, double theta)
      Adds a moveTo step with default timeout and no parallel command.
      Parameters:
      x - Target X coordinate (inches).
      y - Target Y coordinate (inches).
      theta - Target heading (degrees).

    • moveTo

      public void moveTo(Pose2D pose)
      Adds a moveTo step using a Pose2D object with default timeout.
      Parameters:
      pose - Target pose (containing X, Y, and heading).

    • moveTo

      public void moveTo(double x, double y, double theta, Runnable command, double timeout)
      Adds a state to move to a target pose, optionally running a command.
      Parameters:
      x - Target X coordinate (inches).
      y - Target Y coordinate (inches).
      theta - Target heading (degrees).
      command - Runnable command to execute in parallel (can be null).
      timeout - Maximum time allowed for this step (seconds).

    • waitForSeconds

      public void waitForSeconds(double seconds)
      Adds a wait step with no parallel command.
      Parameters:
      seconds - Duration to wait (seconds).

    • run

      public void run(Runnable command)
      Adds a step to run a command immediately (0-second wait).
      Parameters:
      command - Runnable command to execute.

    • waitForSeconds

      public void waitForSeconds(double seconds, Runnable command)
      Adds a state to wait for a duration while holding position, optionally running a command.
      Parameters:
      seconds - Duration to wait (seconds).
      command - Runnable command to execute in parallel (can be null).
